When I’m with my bestie, you should know you are messing with the wrong unit.
I’m a good friend. But together, we are the best friends.
God offered me an all in one package years ago. And here I am with my best friend.
Only my best friend has the right to call me stupid.
Wrong or right. I’ll always be protecting your back.
She is my Best Friend. You break her heart, I will break your face.
Meet my Partner in Crime!
Coffee & Friends make the perfect blend.
I don’t know what I did to have a best friend like you.
Best Friends make the good times better and bad times easier.
Life was meant for Best Friends and Good Adventures!
The only way to have a best friend is to be one.
Rain or Shine. I will be always here for you.
Good Times + Crazy Friends = Great Memories!
Happiness is meeting old friends after a long time..!!
We are the same package with different looks.
No best friend is a misfortune.
Nothing is more relaxing than a friend you can trust.
Life without a best friend is boring as hell.
There is no bad day with a best friend.
Your friendship is a gift. I enjoy opening every day.
Friends are recipe to life.
No friendship is an accident.
Surround yourself with those who make you happy.
Friendship isn’t a big thing. It’s millions of small things.
Best friends are meant to last forever.
Friends become our chosen family.
Friends come and go. Best friends will always find their way back.
Good friends are like Stars. You don’t always see them but you know they will be with you forever.
Side by side or miles apart, real friends are always close to the heart.
A best friend never leaves your side, even when everyone turns their back on you.
A best friend doesn’t give you hope. He makes you do them.
Friendship cannot be measured by days. It’s a lifetime thing.
Life is valuable because friendship adds value to it.
Because I have friends like you, I want to live a thousand year on this earth.
Best friends believe in you when you don’t believe in yourself.
True friends don’t judge each other. They judge other people together!
No man is a failure who has a group of friends.
True friendship is the medicine of life.
True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
Remember no man is a failure who has friends.
A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
Friends are medicine for a wounded heart and vitamins for a hopeful soul.
My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
There are no rules for friendship. It must be left to itself. We cannot force it any more than love.
